item.description:
Who wants to start off the 4th of July weekend with some brews and some grooves?

The Chicken Slacks are a dance band that bring it all - soul, funk, rhythm and blues and a whole lot of groovin and shakin. They played at the Harpoon Summer Session and were smokin' So let's meetup at the Cantab Lounge in Central Square, Cambridge on Thursday, July 2 and kick off the weekend early with a funky groove! Especially since many of us will have Friday the 3rd off from work. :)

Notes:

Cover charge is $5.

As per my usual practice I will email my cell number to all Yes and Maybe RSVPs sometime the day of the event, likely by mid-day, so in case you can't find us, you won't get lost in the crowd.

Cambridge being what it is, parking is limited, but there are spaces on the street, and a few small lots around.
Better yet, if you take the T, the Central Square Red Line stop is just a block away.

Get down, get funky!
item.name: Chicken Slacks at the Cantab
